Plot an Interactive Citation Network from a Snowball Search

Source: R/plot_snowball_interactive.R
plot_snowball_interactive.Rd

This function creates a interactive snowball seaarch network using the networkD3 package.

Usage

plot_snowball_interactive(snowball, key_works, file)

Arguments

snowball

The snowball object containing the network data. The object is returned from the oa_snowball function in the `openalexR“ package

key_works

A data frame, as returned. e.g. by oa_fetch(entity = "works", ..., containing the key-works from the snowball search which will be highlighted in the network.

file

The file name to save the network to. TThe directory has tro esxist. Default: NULL, i.e. not saved.

Value

A networkD3 object representing the interactive network plot.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
plot_snowball_interactive(snowball, key_works, file)
} # }
